dict.acceptation: 寓所，住房；房间；公寓楼；（有特殊用途或专属某人的）豪华寓所；

sent.orig: It had followed me from apartment to apartment, from city to city, almost twenty years.
sent.trans: 这幅画跟着我搬了一个个的公寓，经过了一个个城市，大约有20年了。

sent.orig: Walking upstairs to her apartment, Cindy bumps into the apartment manager, Mr. Lee.
sent.trans: 上楼回公寓的时候，辛迪碰到了公寓管理员李先生。

sent.orig: ISAAC: Oh, the apartment. Jeffrey's taking the apartment.
sent.trans: 伊萨克：哦，公寓，杰弗瑞会住这公寓。

sent.orig: Xintiandi in Shanghai apartment-style hotel-ho apartment through the Tianya choose to do marketing.
sent.trans: 位于上海新天地的公寓式酒店碧豪公寓选择了通过天涯做营销推广。

sent.orig: The COM threading model can be set to single-threaded apartment or multithreaded apartment.
sent.trans: COM线程模型可设置为单线程单元或多线程单元。
